metadata.title: Remove BG - AI Background Remover | RMBG-1.4
metadata.description: Free online AI background remover. Remove image backgrounds instantly using advanced RMBG-1.4 model. Runs entirely in browser for privacy. No registration required.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Remove BG.
faq.moreQuestions: Have more questions? Open an issue on

howItWorks.question: How does the background removal work?
howItWorks.answer: We use advanced AI models (**U2Net** and **RMBG-1.4**) that run entirely in your browser using WebAssembly and ONNX Runtime. The AI analyzes your image, detects the foreground subject, and removes the background automatically.

models.question: What's the difference between U2Net and RMBG?
models.answer: **U2Net** works better for general use cases and is suitable for most images - we recommend using it first. **RMBG-1.4** may perform better in certain specific scenarios and can be tried as an alternative.

privacy.question: Is my data safe?
privacy.answer: **Absolutely!** All image processing happens locally in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to any server. The AI models are downloaded once and cached in your browser for future use.

formats.question: What image formats are supported?
formats.answer: You can upload images in **JPG**, **PNG**, and **WebP** formats. The output is always a **transparent PNG** file that you can use anywhere.

speed.question: How long does processing take?
speed.answer: Processing time depends on image size and your device. Typically, it takes **2-10 seconds** for most images. The first use may take longer as the AI model needs to be downloaded and cached.

quality.question: How can I get the best results?
quality.answer: For best results: **1)** Use high-quality images with clear subjects. **2)** Choose U2Net model for complex backgrounds. **3)** Ensure good contrast between subject and background. **4)** Avoid heavily compressed images.

examples.title: Real
examples.description: Hover to see the background removal animation and witness the powerful AI processing
examples.footerHint: All examples above were processed in real-time by Remove BG in the browser

changelog.title: Change
changelog.description: Track Remove BG version updates and new features

changes.text: AI-powered background removal using U2Net and RMBG-1.4 models
Runs entirely in browser for privacy protection
Batch image processing - upload multiple images at once
Support JPG, PNG, WebP input formats
Customizable background colors with 24 preset options
Dual model switching: U2Net recommended for general use, RMBG for specific scenarios
Local model caching - no re-download needed
PWA support - install as local app for offline use
Neo-Brutalism design with light/dark theme support
